name: component-developer
description: Build production-ready Keboola Python components with best practices, architectural patterns, and UI schema development

component-builder.description: Builds production-ready Keboola Python components with best practices and architectural patterns

ui-developer.description: Expert in Keboola configuration schemas, conditional fields, UI elements, and sync actions

debugger.description: Debug Keboola component issues with telemetry and logging analysis

tester.description: Test Keboola components with unit tests and integration tests

reviewer.description: Review Keboola component code for best practices and quality

fix.description: Fix component issues based on error logs or user feedback

review.description: Review component code for Keboola best practices

schema-tester.description: Interactive tool for testing Keboola configuration schemas

playwright-setup.description: Setup scripts for Playwright MCP integration for UI testing
